question: My parents never let me do anything by myself

answers.text: I’m never let to do anything by myself
I’m never let doing anything by myself
I’m never allowed to do anything by myself
I’m never allowing to do anything by myself

correct_answer: I’m never allowed to do anything by myself
explanation: Bố mẹ tôi không bao giờ cho phép tôi tự làm bất cứ điều gì.
